voen_required: VOEN is not required for individuals
idSerialPrefix_azerbaijan_required: ID Serial Prefix must be either AA or AZE for Azerbaijani nationality
idSerialPrefix_foreign_required: ID Serial Prefix must be either MYI or DYI for foreign citizens
new_password_current_password: New password cannot be the same as the current password
mail_sent_error_message: Due some reasons, we cannot send mail for forgot-password
